text: Ne shibakabukhana halali nibakhanyoola obumanyi khulwe shikhalikhali shiali hakari wabu, ne likhayanga okhuba likhuwa liaranjilila okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi- liokhusitia okhuula khundukho- bakhakhalachilwe, ne toto balia banyoola eshitabu khubalia baliho imbeli wabu bashikanakanilanga nibakoyana
